data.title: WHAT MAKES THINGS BREAK
meta_keywords: What Makes Things Break-up Like They do
What Makes Things Break-up Like They do Hana Pestle
What Makes Things Break-up Like They do letra
data.meta_description: Hana Pestle - What Makes Things Break-up Like They do (Letra y canción para escuchar) - We're killing each other / We have rationalizations / We all wanna get even / Yet, we all wanna believe / That we're innocent / We kindly obey the rules /
data.text:
We're killing each other.

We have rationalizations.

We all wanna get even.

Yet, we all wanna believe

That we're innocent.

We kindly obey the rules.

Yeah! believe in what we really see.

You know we're not really

What we seem.

What makes things

Break-up like they do?

(3x)

Just because they live across the ocean

Doesn't mean they're a different

kind of animal.

I'm sure we love a lot of ourselves.

But can't you see? Can't you see?

That's why we're scared of love.

What makes things

Break-up like they do?

(3x)

La, da, da,

Da, da, da,

Da,

Da,

Da, da, da, da, da

La, da, da,

Da, da, da,

Da,

Da,

Oohhhh.

We make things break

And we do hurt it.

We do not forgive,

But it's in all of us.

All of us...

All of us...
